entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:42 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -33.4°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 40.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 40. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42 with temperature rising to minus 38 by morning.
